mapper.select: SELECT ed.employee_name empName, p.program_no programNo, p.program_name programName, p.program_max_customer maxCustomer, p.program_detail programDetail, p.program_max_customer maxCustomer, pi.program_img_file filename FROM program p INNER JOIN employee_detail ed ON ed.employee_no = p.writer_employee_no INNER JOIN program_img pi ON p.program_no = pi.program_no WHERE p.program_active = 'Y' LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM program WHERE program_active = 'Y'

SELECT ed.employee_name empName, p.program_no programNo, p.program_name programName, p.program_max_customer maxCustomer, p.program_detail programDetail, p.program_max_customer maxCustomer, pi.program_img_no programImgNo, pi.program_img_file filename FROM program p INNER JOIN employee_detail ed ON ed.employee_no = p.writer_employee_no INNER JOIN program_img pi ON p.program_no = pi.program_no WHERE p.program_no = #{programNo} AND p.program_active = 'Y'
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO program( writer_employee_no, program_name, program_detail, program_max_customer ) VALUES ( #{employeeNo}, #{programName}, #{programDetail}, #{programMaxCustomer} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

INSERT INTO program_img( program_no, program_img_origin, program_img_file, program_img_size, program_img_type ) VALUES ( #{programNo}, #{originName}, #{filename}, #{programImgSize}, #{programImgType} )
mapper.update: UPDATE program_img SET program_img_origin = #{originName}, program_img_file = #{filename}, program_img_size = #{programImgSize}, program_img_type = #{programImgType} WHERE program_no = #{programNo}
UPDATE program SET program_active = 'N' WHERE program_no = #{programNo}
